BatchAssociateScramSecret.name: BatchAssociateScramSecret
BatchAssociateScramSecret.description: Grants permission to associate one or more Scram Secrets with an Amazon MSK cluster

BatchDisassociateScramSecret.name: BatchDisassociateScramSecret
BatchDisassociateScramSecret.description: Grants permission to disassociate one or more Scram Secrets from an Amazon MSK cluster

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create an MSK cluster

CreateClusterV2.name: CreateClusterV2
CreateClusterV2.description: Grants permission to create an MSK cluster

CreateConfiguration.name: CreateConfiguration
CreateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an MSK configuration

CreateReplicator.name: CreateReplicator
CreateReplicator.description: Grants permission to create a MSK replicator

CreateVpcConnection.name: CreateVpcConnection
CreateVpcConnection.description: Grants permission to create a MSK VPC connection

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete an MSK cluster

DeleteClusterPolicy.name: DeleteClusterPolicy
DeleteClusterPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a cluster resource-based policy

DeleteConfiguration.name: DeleteConfiguration
DeleteConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the specified MSK configuration

DeleteReplicator.name: DeleteReplicator
DeleteReplicator.description: Grants permission to delete a MSK replicator

DeleteVpcConnection.name: DeleteVpcConnection
DeleteVpcConnection.description: Grants permission to delete a MSK VPC connection

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
DescribeCluster.description: Grants permission to describe an MSK cluster

DescribeClusterOperation.name: DescribeClusterOperation
DescribeClusterOperation.description: Grants permission to describe the cluster operation that is specified by the given ARN

DescribeClusterOperationV2.name: DescribeClusterOperationV2
DescribeClusterOperationV2.description: Grants permission to describe the cluster operation that is specified by the given ARN

DescribeClusterV2.name: DescribeClusterV2
DescribeClusterV2.description: Grants permission to describe an MSK cluster

DescribeConfiguration.name: DescribeConfiguration
DescribeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe an MSK configuration

DescribeConfigurationRevision.name: DescribeConfigurationRevision
DescribeConfigurationRevision.description: Grants permission to describe an MSK configuration revision

DescribeReplicator.name: DescribeReplicator
DescribeReplicator.description: Grants permission to describe a MSK replicator

DescribeVpcConnection.name: DescribeVpcConnection
DescribeVpcConnection.description: Grants permission to describe a MSK VPC connection

GetBootstrapBrokers.name: GetBootstrapBrokers
GetBootstrapBrokers.description: Grants permission to get connection details for the brokers in an MSK cluster

GetClusterPolicy.name: GetClusterPolicy
GetClusterPolicy.description: Grants permission to describe a cluster resource-based policy

GetCompatibleKafkaVersions.name: GetCompatibleKafkaVersions
GetCompatibleKafkaVersions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the Apache Kafka versions to which you can update an MSK cluster

ListClientVpcConnections.name: ListClientVpcConnections
ListClientVpcConnections.description: Grants permission to list all MSK VPC connections created for a cluster

ListClusterOperations.name: ListClusterOperations
ListClusterOperations.description: Grants permission to return a list of all the operations that have been performed on the specified MSK cluster

ListClusterOperationsV2.name: ListClusterOperationsV2
ListClusterOperationsV2.description: Grants permission to return a list of all the operations that have been performed on the specified MSK cluster

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description: Grants permission to list all MSK clusters in this account

ListClustersV2.name: ListClustersV2
ListClustersV2.description: Grants permission to list all MSK clusters in this account

ListConfigurationRevisions.name: ListConfigurationRevisions
ListConfigurationRevisions.description: Grants permission to list all revisions for an MSK configuration in this account

ListConfigurations.name: ListConfigurations
ListConfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all MSK configurations in this account

ListKafkaVersions.name: ListKafkaVersions
ListKafkaVersions.description: Grants permission to list all Apache Kafka versions supported by Amazon MSK

ListNodes.name: ListNodes
ListNodes.description: Grants permission to list brokers in an MSK cluster

ListReplicators.name: ListReplicators
ListReplicators.description: Grants permission to list all MSK replicators in this account

ListScramSecrets.name: ListScramSecrets
ListScramSecrets.description: Grants permission to list the Scram Secrets associated with an Amazon MSK cluster

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags of an MSK resource

ListVpcConnections.name: ListVpcConnections
ListVpcConnections.description: Grants permission to list all MSK VPC connections that this account uses

PutClusterPolicy.name: PutClusterPolicy
PutClusterPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update the resource-based policy for a cluster

RejectClientVpcConnection.name: RejectClientVpcConnection
RejectClientVpcConnection.description: Grants permission to reject a MSK VPC connection

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an MSK resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an MSK resource

UpdateBrokerCount.name: UpdateBrokerCount
UpdateBrokerCount.description: Grants permission to update the number of brokers of the MSK cluster

UpdateBrokerStorage.name: UpdateBrokerStorage
UpdateBrokerStorage.description: Grants permission to update the storage size of the brokers of the MSK cluster

UpdateBrokerType.name: UpdateBrokerType
UpdateBrokerType.description: Grants permission to update the broker type of an Amazon MSK cluster

UpdateClusterConfiguration.name: UpdateClusterConfiguration
UpdateClusterConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of the MSK cluster

UpdateClusterKafkaVersion.name: UpdateClusterKafkaVersion
UpdateClusterKafkaVersion.description: Grants permission to update the MSK cluster to the specified Apache Kafka version

UpdateConfiguration.name: UpdateConfiguration
UpdateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new revision of the MSK configuration

UpdateConnectivity.name: UpdateConnectivity
UpdateConnectivity.description: Grants permission to update the connectivity settings for the MSK cluster

UpdateMonitoring.name: UpdateMonitoring
UpdateMonitoring.description: Grants permission to update the monitoring settings for the MSK cluster

UpdateReplicationInfo.name: UpdateReplicationInfo
UpdateReplicationInfo.description: Grants permission to update the replication info of the MSK replicator

UpdateSecurity.name: UpdateSecurity
UpdateSecurity.description: Grants permission to update the security settings for the MSK cluster

UpdateStorage.name: UpdateStorage
UpdateStorage.description: Grants permission to update the EBS storage (size or provisioned throughput) associated with MSK brokers or set cluster storage mode to TIERED
